alert.note: Alert for Durham; Orange (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 4:00PM EDT until May 23 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE AND SOUTHWESTERN DURHAM COUNTIES... At 359 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hillsborough to near Durham to Cary, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Parkwood, Eno River State Park and Jordan Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
